value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Kinga shinnen!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, what language is
that? I've never heard anything like it!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|It's how they say "Happy New Year!"
in Hoshido. Kinga shinnen!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Kinga shinnen! How cool!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|And with that, let's move out!$k$pOur next mission takes us to Hoshido,
where they're currently celebrating
the new year!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|Look, Takumi! I got "daikichi"! That
means I'll be really lucky, right?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|Yes, but... Why are you so excited
over a silly fortune? They're just a
bunch of nonsense if you ask me.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|Wow, this fortune goes into extra
detail. "You will get along with your
brothers in the new year."$k$pHow about yours, Takumi? What
does your fortune say?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|It says...$k$pUgh, never mind what it says. The
enemy has arrived. We must fight to
abide by the contract.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|We have no choice but to retreat for
now.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_NewYear18,Face|I think you're right... Oh, that reminds
me. What did your fortune say?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けタクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_NewYear18,Face|You remember now, of all times?$k$pUgh, it said..."You will get along with
your brothers in the new year."$k$pNow let's get going!$k$p$Sbs150|
